meanings.definition: A colorless, pungent liquid aldehyde used in the manufacture of plastics.
meanings.sent1: The acrolein was carefully measured before being mixed with other chemicals.
meanings.sent2: Factories use acrolein to create various types of plastic products.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous scientist accidentally spilled acrolein, creating a colorful mess in the lab.
meanings.sent4: The acrolein flowed through the machinery, transforming into sturdy plastic components.
meanings.sent5: The strong smell of acrolein lingered in the air, signaling the start of the plastic production process.

meanings.definition: A toxic substance found in cigarette smoke.
meanings.sent1: Health experts warn about the dangers of inhaling acrolein from cigarette smoke.
meanings.sent2: The acrolein content in cigarettes contributes to their harmful effects on the body.
meanings.sent3: The cartoon character coughed as a cloud of acrolein enveloped him, symbolizing the risks of smoking.
meanings.sent4: The acrolein in the smoke seemed to dance around, causing damage to the lungs.
meanings.sent5: The acrolein in the cigarette smoke acted like a silent intruder, harming the respiratory system without notice.
